001.name: Commander
001.text: Is this the report from the Researcher?

005.name: Commander
005.text: T-This is an SOS pod from the lost expedition, the first ever expedition of humanity!

006.name: Commander
006.text: We never heard of them after passing through the unknown territory at that time.

007.name: Commander
007.text: We might have a lead here as to their whereabouts and fate.

008.name: Commander
008.text: It’s navigation data points to a space near here.
